channel.title: Homes on Longqi Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Longqi Yang

item.description: I am a Ph.D. candidate in the Computer Science Department, Cornell University and Cornell Tech. I am very fortunate to be advised by Prof. Deborah Estrin, and be a member of the small data lab and the Connected Experiences lab (Cx lab). I design and build personalization and recommendation systems that balance commercial interests, individuals’ utility, and societal needs. Recent news: 1 paper accepted to KDD 2019. My research is discussed in the WIRED article The People Trying to Make Internet Recommendations Less Toxic.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Teaching Assistant: CS5785 Applied Machine Learning CS5300 The Architecture of Large-scale Information System CS5434 Defending Computer Networks
